page.title: 11...HOME LIFE
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LOUISE. I woke up at 9a.m.,got up,had a wash and dressed myself.I went down,had my breakfast and watched TV.At 11a.m. I went to call for my friend,Dawn.We went to the shops for my mom.My sister's boyfriend set up his tent in our back garden so mum said we could have lunch in it.Afterwards we went for a bike ride and went to Dawn's house until teatime . I went back for Dawn and we took turns to play on my bike.At 8p.m. we went in and Dawn's mother gave me a packet of Hula Hoops and some Rolos.We listened to some George Michael records as Dawn loves him.At 9.00p.m.I had to go home.I watched TV.for a while before going to bed as I was so tired.My small brother aged 3 was still up when I went to bed playing with his toys.My sister was in the kitchen with her friends listening to some tapes.
